As Australia's leading solar panel recycling and resource recovery company, we provide safe, compliant, and environmentally responsible solutions for residential installers, commercial solar providers, utility-scale projects, and government sectors.

From collection and logistics to clean material processing and circular economy partnerships, we help you responsibly manage end-of-life solar equipment—and transform waste into new opportunity.

Our Partners in Circular Innovation

Supplying Clean, High-Quality Materials for Remanufacturing and Sustainable Product Development

At PV Industries, we don't just recycle solar panels — we unlock their value for the future.

Through our advanced solar panel processing and material recovery systems, we supply clean, high-grade raw materials to innovative partners who remanufacture these materials into new products. Together, we are building a robust circular economy for Australia's solar industry and beyond.

Meet the Team Behind PV Industries

From engineers and logistics specialists to customer support and environmental consultants, every member of our team plays a vital role in delivering trusted recycling solutions to businesses, governments, and communities across Australia.

Introduction & Story Sections

At PV Industries, we're on a mission to make solar truly sustainable. As Australia's leading solar panel recycling and resource recovery company, we provide safe, compliant, and environmentally responsible solutions for residential installers, commercial solar providers, utility-scale projects, and government sectors.

From collection and logistics to clean material processing and circular economy partnerships, we help you responsibly manage end-of-life solar equipment—and transform waste into new opportunity.

02

Closing the loop on solar

PV Industries is an Australian owned recycling company aiming to minimise Australia's environmental footprint. Our goal is to stop solar panel waste from being sent to landfill by collecting and recycling as many end of life solar panels as possible and supplying the recovered material to local manufacturers. We provide solar panel and photovoltaic system waste services including decommissioning, collection and recycling for residential and commercial customers. PV Industries are leading solar panel recycling in Australia, working with prominent universities and government organisations to develop processing technology and comprehensive solutions.

Join us

In Australia, almost one in three households have rooftop solar, and large utility scale installations are constantly being connected to the grid. Solar systems installed by early adopters of the technology are ageing, and many owners will often find it is more cost effective to upgrade their systems to a newer, more powerful one. Often solar panels fail while others are damaged by storms, fire or even during transportation and installation. Solar panel recycling is a sustainable alternative to landfill.

There are numerous economic and environmental benefits to solar panel recycling. Not only does it prevent toxic leachates from entering soil and groundwater, the recovered materials can be reused, supporting local manufacturers by improving efficiency and increasing security of future supply.

01

The future of solar recycling

Services & Solutions Sections

Our Core Services

Comprehensive Solar Panel Recycling Solutions

From collection to material recovery, we provide end-to-end solar panel recycling services that support Australia's transition to a circular economy.

Solar Panel Recycling

Advanced processing technology that recovers up to 95% of materials from end-of-life solar panels, including silicon, silver, aluminum, and glass.

  • 95% material recovery rate
  • Zero landfill guarantee
  • Certified destruction processes
  • Detailed reporting and certificates

National Collection & Logistics

Nationwide pickup and transportation services with specialized handling for solar panels, ensuring safe and efficient collection from any location.

  • Australia-wide coverage
  • Specialized transport vehicles
  • Flexible scheduling
  • Bulk collection services

Clean Material Recovery

High-purity material extraction that meets industry standards for reuse in new solar panels and other applications, closing the circular economy loop.

  • Industry-grade purity levels
  • Quality certification
  • Supply chain integration
  • Sustainable material sourcing

Our Core Services

Solar Panel Recycling

Certified recycling for PV modules, inverters, cabling, and framing. Divert solar waste from landfill with full traceability and reporting.

National Collection & Logistics

From single rooftop systems to multi-megawatt solar farms, we provide reliable and scalable pickup and transportation services across Australia.

Clean Material Recovery

We process end-of-life solar panels into clean, high-quality materials for reuse by our manufacturing partners—supporting circular economy outcomes.

Industries & Impact Sections

Industries We Serve

Comprehensive Solar Recycling Across All Sectors

From residential installations to large-scale commercial projects, we provide tailored solar panel recycling solutions for every industry and application.

Residential Solar

Homeowner solar panel recycling services with convenient pickup and transparent reporting for end-of-life residential systems.

  • Door-to-door collection
  • Homeowner certificates
  • Flexible scheduling
  • Competitive pricing

Commercial & Industrial

Large-scale recycling solutions for commercial buildings, warehouses, and industrial facilities with bulk processing capabilities.

  • Bulk collection services
  • Project management
  • Compliance documentation
  • Volume discounts

Utility-Scale Solar

Specialized handling of utility-scale solar farm decommissioning with advanced logistics and processing capabilities.

  • Large-scale logistics
  • On-site processing
  • Regulatory compliance
  • Environmental reporting

Solar Installers

Partnership programs for solar installation companies to offer comprehensive end-of-life services to their customers.

  • Installer partnerships
  • Customer referrals
  • Technical support
  • Marketing materials

Government & Public

Specialized services for government buildings, schools, and public infrastructure with full compliance and reporting.

  • Tender compliance
  • Public reporting
  • Educational programs
  • Sustainability metrics

Agricultural Solar

Rural and agricultural solar system recycling with understanding of remote locations and farming operations.

  • Rural collection
  • Agricultural expertise
  • Seasonal flexibility
  • Farm-friendly service

04

The values that drive everything we do

Leadership

PV Industries are leaders in solar panel waste management and we aim to shape photovoltaic (PV) recycling in Australia. Through strong leadership we believe we can deliver real action by educating society and demonstrating the benefits of solar panel reuse and recycling.

Integrity

Our business grew from strong moral principles in an attempt to reduce Australia's environmental footprint, so integrity is at the core of our business. Our high level of service is founded in honesty which allows us to build trust with our partners and clients.

Accountability

Many Australians are sceptical of recycling, misinformed and lack an understanding of how their waste is managed and recycled. We aim to change this, being held accountable by our customers as they deserve to know what happens to the waste they recycle.

What We Value as a Team

Our culture is shaped by shared values that guide how we work with each other, with our customers, and with the environment.

Trust & Transparency

We believe in honest communication, integrity, and accountability—from our warehouse floor to boardroom meetings.

Innovation

Our team embraces new technologies and smarter ways of working to stay at the forefront of solar panel recycling.

Customer Focus

Every department at PV Industries is focused on helping our customers succeed and meeting their sustainability goals.

Respect & Teamwork

We foster a positive, inclusive, and collaborative environment where everyone is heard, supported, and empowered to make an impact.

Faces Behind the Mission

While we come from different backgrounds, we're united by one mission: To lead Australia in solar panel recycling and circular economy solutions.

You'll find us:

  • Coordinating logistics from our Sydney HQ
  • Conducting site assessments in the field
  • Processing materials at our recycling facilities
  • Collaborating with clients on custom recycling strategies
  • Working behind the scenes to improve safety, compliance, and sustainability

Sustainability & Commitment Sections

Our Commitment to Sustainability

Leading Australia's Circular Economy Revolution

At PV Industries, sustainability isn't just what we do—it's who we are. Every decision we make is guided by our unwavering commitment to environmental stewardship and creating a truly circular economy for solar energy.

100% Diversion Rate

Zero Waste to Landfill

We guarantee that 100% of solar panels processed through our facilities are diverted from landfill sites.

  • Comprehensive material recovery processes
  • Alternative disposal methods for non-recyclable components
  • Detailed tracking and reporting systems
  • Third-party verification and certification
95% Material Recovery

Circular Economy Integration

Recovered materials are reintegrated into new solar panel manufacturing, creating a true circular economy.

  • High-purity silicon extraction
  • Precious metal recovery (silver, copper)
  • Aluminum frame processing
  • Glass recycling for new applications
Net Zero Emissions

Carbon Neutral Operations

Our facilities operate with net-zero carbon emissions through renewable energy and carbon offset programs.

  • 100% renewable energy powered facilities
  • Carbon offset programs for transportation
  • Energy-efficient processing equipment
  • Continuous emissions monitoring

Sustainability Initiatives

Research & Development

Continuous investment in innovative recycling technologies to improve efficiency and environmental outcomes.

Industry Collaboration

Working with manufacturers, installers, and policymakers to establish industry-wide sustainability standards.

Education & Awareness

Promoting awareness about solar panel recycling and sustainable practices throughout the industry.

Future Innovation

Developing next-generation recycling processes to handle emerging solar technologies and materials.

Partner with Australia's Sustainability Leader

Join us in creating a truly sustainable future for solar energy. Together, we can close the loop on solar sustainability and build a circular economy that benefits everyone.

Partners Sections

06

Our Partners

Why Partner With PV Industries?

Certified Clean Materials

We use industry-leading sorting, shredding, and separation technology to deliver clean, contaminant-free materials that meet your input specifications.

Consistent Supply, Local Sourcing

Our national collection and processing network ensures a reliable supply of materials, reducing dependence on imported raw materials and supporting local manufacturing.

Environmental Impact

By working with PV Industries, you're helping reduce Australia's reliance on virgin resources, cut carbon emissions, and support national circular economy goals.

Strategic Collaboration

We actively collaborate with our partners on product development, R&D, and pilot programs to help transform recycled content into viable, scalable innovations.

Who We Work With

We proudly supply clean recycled materials to:

01

Manufacturers producing construction and industrial materials

02

Companies developing solar panel or battery components

03

Startups innovating with recycled content-based products

04

Government and private sector R&D programs exploring circular manufacturing

05

Designers and engineers committed to sustainable material sourcing

We're always looking for new collaborations that align with our mission to turn solar waste into valuable resources.

Supporting Australia's Circular Economy

Our partnerships are fundamental to creating a truly circular economy for solar panel materials in Australia.

Closed-Loop Material Flows

We work with partners to establish closed-loop systems where end-of-life solar panels become raw materials for new products, reducing waste and virgin resource consumption.

Local Supply Chains

By partnering with Australian manufacturers, we're building resilient local supply chains that reduce dependence on imported materials and support domestic industry.

Innovation Collaboration

We collaborate with partners on R&D projects to develop new applications for recycled materials, creating value-added products and expanding market opportunities.

Sustainable Manufacturing

Our partnerships enable manufacturers to meet sustainability targets, reduce carbon footprints, and demonstrate environmental leadership in their industries.

Materials We Supply:

Clean glass

– used in building materials, tiles, abrasives, and insulation

Refined aluminium

– remanufactured for construction and packaging

Silicon

– for potential reuse in industrial processes or new PV products

Copper & metals

– recovered from cabling and electrical components

Steel and framing materials

– repurposed for structural applications

All materials are processed at our facilities to meet strict quality control standards, ensuring they are suitable for direct reuse or as inputs for secondary manufacturing.

Creating Value Through Clean Material Supply

Our partners span industries including manufacturing, construction, electronics, packaging, and renewable technologies. We provide consistent, high-quality feedstock materials recovered from end-of-life solar panels and components.

Manufacturing
Construction
Electronics
Packaging
Renewable Technologies

Who We Are

Sustainability Advocates

We're driven by the belief that clean energy should never come at the cost of the environment. Our team is committed to closing the loop on solar waste and building smarter, circular systems for the future.

Industry Experts

With backgrounds in renewable energy, waste management, logistics, environmental science, and engineering, our multidisciplinary team brings deep knowledge and hands-on experience to every project.

Problem Solvers

Every job is different, and we thrive on that. Whether it's a complex utility-scale solar decommissioning or a community recycling initiative, we approach each challenge with creativity and precision.

Collaborators

At PV Industries, we don't work in silos. We collaborate across teams—and with our customers—to deliver tailored solutions that exceed expectations.
